title: Uchi no Oochopus
synopsis: The main character is the mysterious lifeform Oochopus. In the series, the Oochopus appears at the house of five-year-old Kantarou and three-year-old An-chan. Kantarou and An-chan accept the cute but somewhat irresponsible Oochopus as family.
voices: ['Asumi, Kana', 'Yamamoto, Kazutomi', 'Yuuki, Chisa', 'Yamaguchi, Kiyohiro', 'Shimura, Tomoyuki', 'Makihara, Chika', 'Takagi, Wataru', 'Echigoya, Kousuke']
